creator: ryo_sode@filemaker.com
text:
Instead of Regex Extrator, it will help a lot if we had a similar extractor that knows how to parse the 
resulting XML document and get a specified element/value specified via XPath. This will improve the 
efficiency in building an XML server test.

creator: jspears@astrology.com
text:
Created attachment 14073
Files for an XPath Extractor

Created attachment 14074
Patch to docs and messages.properties
